trans-unit.source: Contains methods and properties that are used to manage queries to the tracking data that is contained in the SQL database used by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService" />.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery> provides methods and properties that you can use in order to access certain kinds of tracking data stored in a SQL database by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: Mit den von <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery> bereitgestellten Methoden und Eigenschaften können Sie auf bestimmte Arten von Verfolgungsdaten zugreifen, die von <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> in einer SQL-Datenbank gespeichert werden.

trans-unit.source: Access to this data is provided through <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>-Objekte ermöglichen den Zugriff auf diese Daten.

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A> to try to get a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> for a specific workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Sie können <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A> aufrufen, um wenn möglich eine <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> für eine bestimmte Workflowinstanz abzurufen.

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A> to get a collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects that correspond workflow instances that have tracking data that matches a set of query parameters contained in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> that is passed as a parameter to the method.
trans-unit.target: Sie können <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A> aufrufen, um eine Auflistung von <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>-Objekten zu erhalten. Die Objekte entsprechen Workflowinstanzen, deren Verfolgungsdaten mit einer Reihe von Abfrageparametern übereinstimmen, die in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> enthalten sind. Diese Optionen werden als Parameter an die Methode übergeben.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class for more information about the kind of tracking data available and see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class for more information about the kind of queries that can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen zur Art der verfügbaren Verfolgungsdaten finden Sie in den Ausführungen zur <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>-Klasse. In den Ausführungen zur <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>-Klasse finden Sie weitere Informationen zur Art der ausführbaren Abfragen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery" /> class.
The default constructor initializes <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A> to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Der Standardkonstruktor initialisiert<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A> als NULL-Verweis (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: You must set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A> or an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Sie müssen <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A> festlegen, bevor Sie <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A> oder <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A>, sonst wird <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> ausgelöst.

trans-unit.source: The connection string of the SQL database to query.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery" /> class.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A> property is initialized to `connectionString`.

The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.%23ctor%2A> to create an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery> class.
trans-unit.target: Im folgenden Codebeispiel wird die Verwendung von <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.%23ctor%2A> zum Erstellen einer Instanz der <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery>-Klasse veranschaulicht.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DatabaseService.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Dieses Codebeispiel stammt aus dem Workflow Monitor SDK-Beispiel in der Datei DatabaseService.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
<paramref name="connectionString" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
The connection string of the SQL tracking database to query.
A SQL database connection string.
An attempt to set <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString" /> to a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) was made.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> that specifies query parameters.
Returns tracking data for a set of workflow instances that correspond to a set of query parameters specified by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" />.

A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects that provide access to tracking data for the set of workflow instances with tracking data that matches the query parameters specified by <paramref name="options" />.
<paramref name="options" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance for which the tracking data is requested.

When this method returns <see langword="true" />, contains a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> that provides access to the tracking data associated with the workflow instance.
This parameter is passed uninitiailized.
Tries to get query data for a specified workflow instance.
<see langword="true" /> if tracking data is available for the requested workflow instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>.
trans-unit.target: Im folgenden Codebeispiel wird die Verwendung der <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A>-Methode zum Abrufen von <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> veranschaulicht.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DatabaseService.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Dieses Codebeispiel stammt aus dem Workflow Monitor SDK-Beispiel in der Datei DatabaseService.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
